alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 06 at 3:15AM PST until February 07 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST MONDAY FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are likely to occur overnight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
